reviews.review_text: The baguette tasted so freshly baked and the filling inside (I got beef) tasted very delicious and freshly cooked too. The spring roll wasnt oily at all. The best part is the coconut smoothie. It tasted so milky, smooth and very rich in coconut flavour! and fresh!!! Everything was packed thoroughly and the staff was wearing gloves. Amazing Place! I would definitely come over again here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing all around, thanks for caring about the details - so happy to hear this. thanks so much!

reviews.review_text: Great hidden gem in Vancouver,. Delicious food, unique interior design and friendly staff. The content is well seasoned and not overpowering. Decent porportion and reasonable pricing on Broadway. The pre bottled coffee is a bit too sweet for our taste, but its still pretty good! (Ps. to obanhmi team,  you shall update the name thats associated to your food cateogory/ restaurant.  We have tried using three separate Google accounts and could not find you on Google my business, until we manually input the name in)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks Leo - detailed feedback like this will help our chef adjust the menu slightly overtime when we see a pattern. Google listing is a mystery and so difficult to navigate   thanks for the pro tip and we might have to find an expert to help eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: Awesome place to grab a quick lunch! And drink included for less than $15! Such a steal! Highly recommend, you also get points so you can redeem for a free banhmi! I like the lemongrass chicken, satay beef, honey chicken breast and minced garlic pork! For Drinks, love the avocado smoothie and the sweet pea drink!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks Jade! Sounds like youre a pro for having tried so many items on the menu - glad you like!

reviews.review_text: Their banh mi is solid. I always order cold cut. Its good that they offer 5% discount for online orders and also they accept credit cards, not quite shady like the other shops. Though, they dont provide napkins for to-go orders. I am not sure why. Edited: since the owner already explained that they do provide napkins, I think for some reason, they just forgot mine so I changed to 5 instead of 4.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Hieu - so sorry we forgot the napkins - we do provide in the bag.

reviews.review_text: I got the deluxe classic banh minh and it did not disappoint! For a banh Minh, it is just slightly more expensive than the typical but with the added quality and portion, it is a fair price. The bread was super fresh and soft, with just the right amount of crunch without scraping the rooftop of your mouth. Simple and delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks Kerry for highlighting value portion and taste! So glad you enjoyed  - always open to hear more feedback and if we dont deliver 5 stars all the time eric@obanhmishop.com or Insta @obanhmishop or Maps chat.

reviews.review_text: our first time trying obanhmi. their vietnamese sandwiches are fresh with lots of flavourful fillings. we ordered the sate beef, xiu mai and cold cut sandwich. we liked the sate beef in particular because of the special sauce. price is reasonable too. we got 3 sandwiches for $19.25. service is very efficient and store is very clean. highly recommended for those who have a crave in vietnamese sandwiches.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for all the compliments

reviews.review_text: one of the best in Vancouver. The classic & lemon grass chicken banh mis are my favorites. I typically order a bunch of sandwiches for my staff which I have done several times. I ordered today but unfortunately I was missing my #1 favorite thing from this place which was the iced coffee.. which I called them about and they were more than happy to deliver a complimentary one for me. Regardless of the mistake. This is a business worth being recognized for good quality food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for your support - will thank the team for going the extra mile to correct the mistake.

reviews.review_text: Great service and amazing sandwiches. I highly recommend special cold cut and their thai green milk tea
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a mil Vivian - glad to hear this

reviews.review_text: Update: Revisited, the bread was fresh and the vegan banhmis are really good. Impressed!! Otherwise, the store is very clean, and workers were nice!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for trying and writing feedback - we want high expectations to match with our promise for quality. Please contact me for refund - eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: Im so happy to find a banh mi shop near my home. Sandwiches are fresh and delicious. I appreciate the smoothie came in a large cup and ice coffee filled to the top. Online ordering was a breeze and ready when I arrived. Their parking was difficult to find at the back, but I ended up finding street parking. I dont know why their vegetarian sandwich costs more, but, regardless, they are my new go to banh mi place, and I will be a regular!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a mil Lina - glad you enjoyed everything. As for the veggie sandwich, the avocado, and marinated tofu cost more, and we we make the special filling (from yam) to give veggie sandwich flavors and taste substantial.

reviews.review_text: So stoked there is a new location of these guys opened a 2 min walk from my pad. If you have kids going to college, my friend and I will put them through college as we l be eating here and spending here daily!haha love it!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Lol our kids and team members at Broadway will invite you guys to the graduation party for more banh mi    Please reach out if you ever think we are not consistently 5 stars - eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: Love having a fresh banh mi shop near the house! The buns are crunchy and chewy, and feel very fresh. Theres plenty of flavour packed into the banh mi and they dont charge for extra cilantro or jalapeno. Prices are very reasonable! Will definitely be coming back for lunch more.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you had a good experience - thats right we go above and beyond for customers (taste, value, service). Many thanks!

reviews.review_text: Delicious, crusty bread and a yummy sandwich made for a great lunch! Just steps from Broadway and Fir. Already thinking of my next visit!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a mil Holly - see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: You can not find food in this city for these great prices. Excellent value for the portion size and quality. This is our 3rd or 4th time trying this restaurant. Good every time!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a mil Nicole for sharing about your positive experiences!

reviews.review_text: One of my favorite Banhmi place!! Delicious and great price!! I usually buy 2 different banhmi because I could never decide which one I love more! Haha! Well, its a win win for all of us! Thanks for a wonderful lunch!! Cheers!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: That is such a good spirit, many thanks for the awesome feedback!

reviews.review_text: The baguette was light, crispy, and golden flaky! Price and quality is fantastic! My favourite new fast food restaurant! Service is good, too! I will be coming back again soon!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow - thanks so much!

reviews.review_text: Update to my original review: this location is by far the best one - I ordered once from the yaletown location and my bread was less fresh there. Keep up the great work! Really enjoyed the sandwiches and fresh rolls. Glad they are in the area!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks for supporting, Rosa! Its good to be in the neighborhood.

reviews.review_text: Really tasty banh mi - we ordered sate beef and lemongrass chicken. The meat had lots of flavour and the bread wasnt so crusty where it cuts up your mouth. We ordered veggie spring rolls too, those were average, nothing special. On Uber Eats I specified a nut allergy for my partner and they tried to call to say sate beef has peanut sauce in the marinade, but I couldnt pick up as I was in a meeting. Im glad they left a note on the sandwich. It was ok because I ate that one instead of us sharing the two types. I would recommend adding notes about which items have nuts on the descriptions, as the Uber Eats description didnt indicate peanut sauce. Maybe its supposed to be assumed with sate sauce, but its better to be safe and clear. We would definitely order again! Edit: I left a review on Uber Eats before posting the Google review. No worries.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great catch, weve updated the description for Sate Beef banh mi on Uber and will do the same everywhere else that is missing. Please leave an Uber review, that way the system will allow me to send you a credit. Many thanks Kaitlin for supporting Obanhmi - looking forward to serve you again.

reviews.review_text: I have eat Vietnamese banh mi in several places but Obanhmi is the best, especially Deluxe Cold Cut and Meatball. I recommend everyone should come here and taste it. p/s: serving quickly and friendly staff makes me feel welcomed every time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Triet - we treat our staff well and our customers well - everyone is happy at our shops!

reviews.review_text: Tried this place today - got the lemongrass chicken and honey garlic banh mi. Both so delicious, really fresh bread and ingredients. There was some confusion because we asked for extra chicken in one sub but don t think they heard.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback Sami - shared your feedback with the team.

reviews.review_text: *Not a biased opinion* A DECENT BANH MI SHOP IN TOWN. There are many locations of the brand, but this is the best one that has offered great customer service and food to me so far. I ordered a deluxe cold cut banh mi and paired it with a bottle of Vietnamese coffee that absolutely satisfied my taste on that day. Kudos to Nhi who served me that day. Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Tristan - glad you noticed all the things that we care about a lot!

reviews.review_text: I got the lemongrass chicken and it was delicious. The bread was nice and crispy on the outside and so soft on the inside.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Perfect - thanks a mil.

reviews.review_text: Ummm wow! Absolutely delicious and very reasonable price. Every banh mi Ive had since trying this place has been disappointing comparatively.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ohhh would love to keep you here from now on. Please send a note right away if something is off - eric@obanhmishop.com - thanks a mil.

reviews.review_text: The best Banh mi in town. Doesnt match the one in Montreal but I like it. Plus they have vegan option  .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow, thanks so much. Testing another vegan item right now in the secret kitchen haha, hopefully we will roll it out soon eric@obanhmishop.com if interested in tasting and giving feedback.

reviews.review_text: Taste great and affordable price for lunch time, especially, the deluxe sandwich and the passion lemonade. Definitely will come back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much, looking forward to your next visit, please let me know if we are not consistently 5 stars.

reviews.review_text: Tried the bahnmi here for the first ime and it was delicious. So fresh and tasty. And the service was delightful :) Definitely going back.. especially for the Vietnamese coffee!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a mil Ronica - so glad you discovered us and welcomed us into the neighborhood.

reviews.review_text: Sandwiches are so tasty, just wish the peanut sauce for the salad wraps were a little less watery
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a mil!

reviews.review_text: Excellent sandwiches. They are fresh, rapidly made and, for now, well priced!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks!

reviews.review_text: good classic banh mi at a good price!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much - glad you liked it!

reviews.review_text: Friendly staff, and delicious food.  Love the vegetarian banh mi
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Yes!!! so glad you liked it a lot. Thanks!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_text: Tasty, inexpensive, fast and friendly service. Welcome to the neighbourhood - happy to have you guys here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the welcome and the support - we promise to deliver good dining experience each time, feedback always welcomed eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: My go-to bahn mi place for lunch when Im working!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: So glad - thanks a mil!

reviews.review_text: Love the Cold Cut Deluxe. Good smoothies too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, they go great together! Highly recommend one of the teas if you want something different next time!

reviews.review_text: Quite delicious and well priced!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks Alec!

reviews.review_text: Really like this place. Miss the Coconut smoothie though!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! We are actively working on bringing it back - sourcing ingredients are getting more difficult these days

reviews.review_text: Best food ever thank you for the amazing lunches so you again tomorrow
reviews.response_from_owner_text: See you again so soon, love it!

reviews.review_text: Great band mi and very friendly staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much, will let the team know to keep it up.

reviews.review_text: Great sandwiches, friendly service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much Phu for the good review.

reviews.review_text: May be the best Vietnamese subs in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Well thank you, will accept your vote of confidence. So glad to have your support.

reviews.review_text: Great staff, great food, so happy this is here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a mil Derek, you gave us the first 5-star review! Please reach out if you dont find us delivering 5 stars consistently - eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: Cheap, tasty banh mi!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Straight to the point, tasty banh mi and good values are the bare minimum. Thanks Clinton!

reviews.review_text: Super yummy, friendly service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, thats a win-win!
Wow! Many thanks Obi!
Thank you so much!!!
Many thanks!
Many thanks!
Many thanks!
Thanks a mil!
Thank you!
Super, thank you!!
Many thanks Carol!
Many thanks!
Thanks a mil!
Yay! thank you!
Love to see this, thank you!

reviews.review_text: Banh mi here is okay but a bit dry for my liking. Avocado smoothie is so good. I wasn t so impressed with their pork salad roll as the peanut sauce isn t thick enough. Good value and quick service, can order online easily for pick up.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wish your dining experience was way better; would love for you to give it another try and gather a little more feedback to help us improve - eric@obanhmishop.com for details. Thank you!

reviews.review_text: The food was good but theres always room for improvement. The sandwich was fresh and the spring roll surprisingly crispy for a take out deep fried item at room temp. The coconut shake was the highlight. The main thing is Id like to shout out the 2 staff. They were so overwhelmed with orders and even a snarky lady but they dealt with it amazingly. They were running off their feet but managed to put out yummy food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a mil Lena - will reward our team members. Hope to earn the fifth star one day, we welcome feedback to improve.

reviews.review_text: If you re looking for a yummy, inexpensive and quick lunch, this is the place. Prices are hard to beat and sandwiches are packed with protein. Bread can be quite crummy, I recommend asking for it not to be toasted. A constant staple at my workplace.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a mil Teagan!

reviews.review_text: Due to the high reviews on Google, I did have expectations trying them out for the first time. I went early for lunch (11am) to beat the lunch rush, and got the deluxe classic. I found the cilantro and jalapeno to be stale. Like it was left overnight in the fridge and dried out. I cant quite pinpoint the bread, its not out of the oven in the morning fresh, but not stale either. Lastly, the sandwich was built lopsided, so one side had a lot of radish and carrot and the other side had none. A bit more pate and butter would have made the overall sandwich less dry. Having said all of that, I will go back to try the lemongrass chicken, something a bit more wet to begin with. The location is far too close to my work and I can literally eat banh mi everyday.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: That is not good presentation at all - please send a message so we could make another one for you to compare. Thanks so much! eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: A good all around Bahn mi place. The sandwiches are quite good and Ive never had bad service or sub par food. I also recommend the vietnamese coffee!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks for the compliments on the food and service!

reviews.review_text: Great Banh Mi with affordable prices. Deducted one star for now since my last visit they put chili sauce in my sandwich even though I didnt ask for it. Ended up burning my bum the next day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sam - let us earn the 5th star in the next few visits - if you find more mix up Id like to hear about it - eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: Great customer service - my order is always ready without issues (order online method)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks!

reviews.review_text: Very fast and great food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks, David!

reviews.review_text: Very delicious Vietnamese buns, you must try their Nem Fries. The one in the middle is supposed to be luncheon meat. The coffee is also very good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!
Many thanks Marc!
Many thanks!
Many thanks!
Many thanks!
Thank you Amir!
Thanks so much!

reviews.review_text: Just purchased 3 sandwiches from the west Broadway location. Picked it up and went straight home to eat it. The meats and veggies inside where good but bread was stale. Disappointing! Banh Mi Saigon and Ba Le uses fresh bread. Update: the business replied to this review and offered me a refund if I sent them an email, which I did. I have not received a response from them or a refund a week after they replied on Google.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sorry to hear - happy to refund and remake you another order. Will also double check with our team about handling quality and freshness. eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: They used to be the ONLY good Banh mi in all of Van. But then like two weeks ago, prices changed, ingredients changed. Their Xiu Mai Banh Mi was *chefs kiss*. Now it taste worse for more money. Idk why the owner did this change. Everyone I know loves this place and hasn t gone back since the change. Please bring back the Old Banh Mi.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael - thanks for letting me know about the experience. We haven t changed the recipe, so let us treat you to another and refund the one you thought was bad to compare and find out what went wrong. As for the raising prices, it was a tough choice to make to keep up with rising costs to keep business running - but we promise to keep portion big and quality high  as always. eric@obanhmishop.com or chat on Google Business listing or message me on Instagram @obanhmishop

reviews.review_text: Ive been coming here for a couple of months now and have tried every item on their menu several times over. Their breads are delicious, and the banhmis are well seasoned without being oily, salty and the toppings generally taste fresh. The service is quick, restaurant looks clean, and I like their minimal plastic packaging. After a brief hiatus and on this last visit, they have begun nickel and diming for their sandwiches. I ordered extra meat (as I always do), and feel like I barely got any extra. For 2$ (which is like a quarter the cost of a sandwich, I would expect a rather full sandwich. I also paid for extra dikon and radishes (which was 50cents but used to be free), and the sandwich was just... Normal. It wasnt any larger. For all of this nickel and diming, Im sure not seeing any results for it. I am paying more and getting objectively less. The tofu salad roll that I always liked, was now smaller, the tofu was much saltier than before, and worse yet, the peanut sauce they gave felt like it was water with peanut butter bits mixed into it. I didnt even bother using it. Im not sure whether I will return, probably one more time to give it one more shot. But this place certainly wont be one of my reliable go-to, healthy, and affordable restaurants anymore.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Appreciate the feedback and we will look closely into portion control - definitely not because we are cutting back on ingredients in the sandwich. Weve heard about the peanut sauce a few times so I will let our chef know. Please contact eric@obanhmishop.com for a refund.

reviews.review_text: First time and was excited to try..LOVE Bahnmi. A little dissapointed..was dry and lacked flavor. The pickled Daikon and carrots need more flavor too. Im used to a bit more fish or oyster sauce and a flavor punch! Very Average. Good price though.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback - passed your note to our chef. We keep a log of feedback and always looking to improve.

reviews.review_text: Banhmi classic is good, but without the extra daikon/carrot option is a bit sad.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We added back the option to add extra carrots & daikon

reviews.review_text: Somehow the Kingsway location has better tasting Banhmi Customer service is good though
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We need to get really good at consistency - thanks for the feedback - will take a closer look to improve if you could help us share more details eric@obanhmishop.com ... hope to earn 5 stars someday.

reviews.review_text: Health hazard place. The guy was happily spraying bug spray 3 feet away from where the food was being prepared. They didn t let us in as they were trying to hide the fact.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Weve reviewed practices with the team to make sure food safe is top priority.

reviews.review_text: So sad the bahn mis used to be so big and one would fill me up. Now they are so small like a snack and no longer a meal.  Too bad I really liked this place the beef sate was my favorite.  Rather spend my money elsewhere.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Apologies for the inconsistency - we havent down size or cut back on ingredients - perhaps that day our baker made a couple buns too small? Please let us treat you next time or offer refund eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: They charged me twice and I got extremely sick after having their honey garlic sandwich and avocado smoothie, and pork spring roll. The sauce for the spring roll smelled rancid and I threw it out after one dip. I had their food twice in one week. Its a fact the food from here caused me to get sick. I ve been in pain for hours, with bouts of intense stomach cramps, diarrhea, and nausea. I failed to mention that I also found a dead green bug inside my banh mi. I reported this store to public health, who confirmed from my symptoms that I got a food borne illness. They are on their way to investigate Obanhmi Broadway. Diners beware!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: The district health inspector gave 0 concerns after inspection a couple days ago - happy to provide report or you can obtain official copy from Coastal Health. We stand by the quality of the food and cleanliness of the store - please send a note to eric@obanhmishop.com so I can look up the transactions to give refunds.

reviews.review_text: Worst Banhmi ever of the hundreds I ve tried. We went here for their high reviews but tasted like bad Subway, zero Vietnamese flavors. It s difficult to get Banhmi wrong but this place is.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Must be on off day - we made something wrong. Happy to give refund and find you another sandwich to try for free - eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: A terrible experience, I ate a bug in the sandwich, and I hope the business will do a good job of hygiene and be professional!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Please email order details and / or a pic so I can look into it and offer help. eric@obanhmishop.com

reviews.review_text: Their opening hours are incorrect
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Apologies for no updating holiday hours. Thanks for making the trip out, to make up for the inconvenience, your next lunch is on me eric@obanhmishop.com or insta @obanhmishop or Google business chat

reviews.review_text: Rude, ripoff, bad food, deliberately overcharge hoping  customers wont notice, money hungry bunch of lowlife.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Not at all how we want to run business - send me a note so we can look into this eric@obanhmishop.com
